alert.note: Alert for Forrest (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 24 at 11:28PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Forrest County through MIDNIGHT CST... At 1128 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eastabuchie to 7 miles west of Maxie. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hattiesburg, Petal, Mclaurin, Brooklyn, Sunrise, Macedonia, Maxie, Eastabuchie, Rock Hill and Corinth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for southeastern Mississippi.
